item.title: Deep Dive: Apple notifications and the Religious Right
item.description: I’ve liked my iPhone. Except for notifications. Google did them much better. But, that’s just an annoyance. The Religious Right and it’s efforts to create a love child with our political leaders is downright scary. We should be very scared. All of us. Even the good people who subscribe.
